alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 11:57AM AKST until December 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOWFALL DIMINISHING FOR MANY AREAS FOR CHRISTMAS EVE... Snow totals across the panhandle have ranged from as low as 2 inches to up to 13 inches, but most have been in the 4 to 8 inch range. The first band of precipitation has moved out of the area to the north and the second is now forecast to stall and weaken over the central inner channels this evening. Several winter storm warnings have been cancelled as a result. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Storm total snow accumulations of 20 to 25 inches. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to continue through the afternoon and into tonight. Expect another 8 to 10 inches through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
